Class PlayerGrid

org.project.Model.PlayerGrid
public class PlayerGrid extends Object

  • Method Details

    • topUp

      public void topUp(int column, Tile tile)
      The method fills a spot with a tile with a mechanism similar to a stack with the exception that checks if a column is full (it throws exception)
      Parameters:
      column - selected by the player
      tile - that the player wants to put in his grid

    • spaceCheck

      public boolean spaceCheck(int column, int n_tiles)
      Parameters:
      column - in which the player wants to put the selected tiles
      n_tiles - that the player wants to put in the selected column
      Returns:
      a boolean that tells if the number of tiles is available in a column

    • fullCheck

      public boolean fullCheck()
      Returns:
      boolean that tells if the grid is full

    • getSpot

      public Spot getSpot(Coordinates c)
      Parameters:
      c - coordinates of the player grid
      Returns:
      the spot selected with the coordinates

    • getGrid

      public Spot[][] getGrid()

    • setTile

      public void setTile(int column, int row)

    • printPlayerGrid

      public void printPlayerGrid()
      The method prints the player grid

    • quickGridSetter

      public void quickGridSetter(Color[][] matrix)
      The method sets the grid with the colors specified in the matrix
      Parameters:
      matrix - matrix of Color

    • printColorPlayerGrid

      public void printColorPlayerGrid()
      The method prints the coloured player grid
